tictactoe.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Class is responsible for the basic game mechanics.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(int rows,
                  int cols,
                  int winningStreak,
                  boolean isHumanMode)
        Method sets up the game with parameters collected from the user.
        Parameters:
        rows - Rows of the board
        cols - Columns of the board
        winningStreak - Number of marks in a row required to win
        isHumanMode - Mode of playing; true = human vs. AI, false = AI vs. AI

      • start

        public void start()
        Method is used to start the game from the main class and for controlling turns and the course of the game.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()

      • getWinningStreak

        public int getWinningStreak()

      • getLatestMove

        public Move getLatestMove()

      • switchPlayer

        public void switchPlayer()
        Method switches player (from player 1 to 2 or from 2 to 1).

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove(Move move)
        Method validates a move and updates the board accordingly.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to be validated
        Returns:
        true if move is legal, false if move is illegal

      • isGameWon

        public boolean isGameWon()
        Method checks if there is a winning streak on the board by the current player.
        Returns:
        true if streak exists, false if not

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Method checks if game is over based on no. of moves made.
        Returns:
        true if no more moves are possible, false if there are possible moves

        public Player getPlayer1()
